title: Earn Free LBRY Credits! (Can be converted to bitcoins).
body:
I don't know if many of you guys remember Stellar, but essentially they gave out $20+ in crypto (which you were able to convert to BTC) just for signing up.

LBRY is the exact same thing, they are giving away crypto in hopes you adopt their new currency

1) So, essentially they are giving away 10 LBC for signing up (I don't know if you have to use a referral link but I'll provide one if you want to use itRolleyes)

2) Then they are giving you another 20 LBC for completing their claim tasks. 

Note: After you confirm your email address you need to wait (reports of 72 hours+) to receive your invite + download link to their cryptocurrency. 

You can sell it at an exchange such as: https://poloniex.com/exchange#btc_lbc

Here's my referral link: https://lbry.io/get?r=BhD3m

replies.body: I would like to let everyone know that this is the last month to sign up for early access!
